# PointLight

**Class**

An entity that produces an omnidirectional light for virtual objects.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency class PointLight
```

## Overview

During an AR session, RealityKit automatically lights your virtual objects to match real-world lighting. You can also explicitly add virtual lights that act upon your virtual content. This is typically most useful outside of an AR session on iOS or macOS, where your [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityViewCameraContent] [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityViewCameraContent/camera] property is set to [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/RealityViewCamera/virtual].

The point light is an omnidirectional light that illuminates all the virtual content within a configurable radius from the light. This is equivalent to creating an [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity], and then adding a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PointLightComponent] to its [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/Entity/components] set.

A RealityKit scene can contain up to eight dynamic lights, which are entities that contain a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SpotLightComponent], [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/PointLightComponent], or a [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/DirectionalLightComponent]. This limit doesn’t include light from image-based lighting.

## Entity compliance

- **HasPerspectiveCamera**: An interface that enables you to configure a virtual camera that you can use to define the rendering perspective when you’re not in an AR session.
- **HasPointLight**: An interface that defines a point light source component.
- **SpotLight**: An entity that illuminates virtual content in a cone-shaped volume.
- **HasSpotLight**: An interface that defines a spot light source component.
- **DirectionalLight**: An entity that casts a virtual light in a particular direction.
- **HasDirectionalLight**: An interface that defines a directional light source component.
